name: Bomberman Panic Bomber
description:
Rotate Bomberman as they fall. Line-up alike colors to clear your side,
and send rubble over to your opponent. When a giant red bomb appears,
use it clear a large area on you side and send a huge amount of rubble
your opponents way. Watch out though, if your Bomberman reach the top,
it's game over!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
